snippet.title: Lust from Beyond: M Edition - Reveal Trailer | PS4
snippet.description: The first look at Lust from Beyond: M Edition, the new version of the cult PC survival horror inspired by the works of H.P. Lovecraft and H.R. Giger. This edition is tailored for wider audiences, focused on the narrative rather than on the explicit horror content, and is coming to PlayStation.
